title: Everburn Blade
content:
Proficiency: Greatsword Proficiency or Martial Weapon Proficiency. Rarity: Uncommon Value: 240 GP. Weight: 2.7 ID: 660483f6-8eb3-45be-88a4-327f9d417026 You can pick up this weapon with any character, they will still have it in their inventory after the Nautiloid crash You can cast Command "drop" to force Zhalk drop this weapon. You cannot sheathe this weapon Ever-Burning: An arcane flame that cannot be quenched.
